on reading compounds: 訛言【カゲン】non-standard pronunciation, dialect, mistaken rumor, baseless gossip
kun reading compounds: 訛る【なまる】to speak with an accent, to be corrupted (of word), to mispronounce
訛り【なまり】accent (of one's speech), dialect, provincialism, patois, corrupted form (e.g. of word), mispronunciation
